message: Let's be fair, I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's a good deal!
I think 55% for me is a fairer deal, considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 57% and you can have 43%. It's the best deal you'll get from me.
I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the inflation is affecting your share. This is a good chance for you to accept before it's worth even less.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below 54%. Take it before the inflation eats away more of my share.
The inflation is really hurting your share now. I think it's time for me to take the bigger piece of the pie. This is my final offer.
